answers.answer: Hi first thing is you have to get some of the weight off it will help alot with your periods and long with everything else.  I have pcos and over weight but the weight is dropping off cause I am staying consistant.  Things will take time.  Do you take something for the migraines?  I am also trying to concieve you just have to be patient.

you should seek help with a doctor...maybe try different medication instead of the met...do you know why met dint work for you???im 312lbs and i also have PCOS i just recently had a baby boy who was born premature due to other medical problems (inconpetence cervix) but i was like 340lbs before i started trying to coincive at that time i wasent aware i had PCOS so my OB put me on met. and its been wonderfully im also avoiding carbs and eating more protein and on an exercise program i managed to get down to 320 lbs thas when i got preggo's my whole pregnancy i only gained 8 lbs since he was born so early...so now im down to 312 and i would like to have another baby and start trying again by the end of this yr because it took me and my husband almost 2 yrs to coinceive our son..and time is ticking so im trying to loose all the weight that i can now....good luck hun!.

Thankyou... I dont know why it didnt work yet.... everyone is stumped... Im trying to get a stricter diet.... Im already pretty good with it... now im just going to tighten up loose ends and pray.. Congratulations on the baby...
by the way in im detroit too! macomb area!

Ask your Doctor about endometriosis, I am 23 and have both PCOS and endometrisis, my periods are irregular and I have chronic pain and major mood swings, and can't hardly move due to the pain and at times my period has lasted up to 7 weeks.

question: HI, im 23 and at this point wiegh 405 pounds. I am diabetic as you probably can guess by the wieght. The problem is I exercise and eat a decent diet. Due to the diabetes I have to allow myself some sugar or I get very ill. What do I do metformin didnt work for me. I want to lose the wieght because I would like to have a child...My other symptoms areI either have no period and then then when i get one 1 to 2 months later I am basically bed ridden from the pain. When i do get them regulary I have migraines and severe cramps, bloating, extreme swelling of feet ect. Sometimes the bleeding will last more then a week. I have had one as long as a month... any advice
title: PCOS 23
